It is a cloudy day outside, so you are happy when you reach Ananda's Hotel. As you enter the building you see a lot of races walking through the large lobby, whether they be going to the swimming pool, activity room, or checking into one of the hundreds of rooms.

You think to yourself "I might as well stay in here the rest of the day.... what to do?"

Unfortunately you trip over someone's luggage and fall on a large feral dragon's tail. He turns around and says to you in a threatening tone "You are lucky there are witnesses here, or else you would know what happens for hurting my tail."

You back away from the angry dragon and think to yourself chuckling. "He is threatening me without knowing who I am."

Who are you?

info.brief_description: Modern era. vore theme. Includes anthros, sentient feral and other mythical beasts.
info.description:
This is a vore story in the settings of Ananda's famous Hotel. It is large enough to hide dark/taboo secrets which include vore, AV, and UB.
There are a few rules to this storyline.
*Ananda cannot be prey.
*No Reformation.
*Humans cannot be pred.
*If you make a new char then add detail to describe him/her/hir.

Things like Scat, and Flatulence are okay to be put in the story.

Have fun reading and/or adding to the story.
info.pretty_title: Ananda's Hotel: Modern furry vore story.
